meanings.sent1: The skilled filleters at the market quickly prepare the fresh catch for customers.
meanings.sent2: The filleters at the seafood restaurant work efficiently to remove bones from the fish fillets.
meanings.sent3: The filleters had a friendly competition to see who could fillet the fish the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The precision of the filleters' knife skills was like watching a master artist at work.
meanings.sent5: The filleters delicately handled each fish, showcasing their expertise in preparing seafood.

meanings.definition: A machine used for filleting fish.
meanings.sent1: The filleters in the factory operate the machines to process large quantities of fish.
meanings.sent2: The automated filleters in the processing plant save time and effort in fish preparation.
meanings.sent3: The filleters' machines hummed along, making the task of filleting fish much easier.
meanings.sent4: The efficiency of the filleters' machines revolutionized the fish processing industry.
meanings.sent5: The factory invested in state-of-the-art filleters to streamline their production process.
